title: Ticket #2999: User priority factors: change out of box default to 100
description:
Based on a discussion with khahn, before doing anything, he should be consulted to get more information.

khahn believes that the out-of-the-box default for user priority factors should be 100, giving administrators room to improve the priority factor down to 1 or worsen it to some large number. At the moment the out-of-the-box default is 1.

Priority factors should be floating point numbers, so it should be possible to lower it below 1. khahn doesn't believe this is practical, he should be consulted on why.
remarks:
2018-Sep-21 10:43:51 by jfrey:
The default priority factor was changed to 1000 in #4282.
